name: 3D Platformer (gjs1025)
description:
This is my 3D Platformer project.

Future Modifications:

1) I will complete a new interesting, comprehensive, and coherent level. I will do this by adding more enemies and props.

2) I will add multiple additional levels and tie them in to create a logical progression in my game. I will do this by increasing the amount of enemies in each level.

3) I will modify the out of game menus in a few different ways.

Credits:
